website_summaries.verdict: Puma upgraded another classic silhouette. The Puma Basket Classic Summer Shade features a well-ventilated version of the classic sneaker that has been shaded with summer-ready colors. Its stylish yet simple design will let its wearers enjoy the warm breeze, making this an excellent addition to one's sunny season ensemble.
pros: The Puma Basket Classic Summer Shade is available at an affordable price point
It is presented in multiple colorways
Buyers liked that this shoe is easy to clean
Most of the reviewers shared that the Basket Classic Summer Shade is very comfortable
This shoe delivers excellent ventilation, said many reviewers
Most of the reviewers commended the lightness of this shoe
Few liked that this kick has an ample amount of arch support
Several purchasers liked the straightforward look of this shoe
Many disclosed that they would highly recommend this sneaker to their friends
cons: One buyer complained that the quality of the leather upper of the Puma Basket Classic Summer Shade felt like plastic

customer_reviews.title: Summer Shades Puma Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great casual shoe with a non-white trim that is easier to care for. Very comfortable to wear and the color was great for my style. product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Basket Classic Summer Shade-M Basket Classic Summer Shade
product_meta.description: Originate from the PUMA archive back in 1971, this was the leather answer to the suede. It's singular but yet clean and simple design propelled this shoe into the sneaker Hall of Fame. A new upper is provided for this season in the summer shade pack, in which the formstripe is neatly displayed underneath an outer layer, adding a simplistic yet stylish detail for the sneakerhead icon.
